query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
1 Già era dritta in sù la fiamma e queta 2 per non dir più, e già da noi sen gia 3 con la licenza del dolce poeta,
query.error: **English:** 1 Already the flame was erect and still 2 so as to say no more, and already it was moving away from us 3 with the permission of the gentle poet,
query.result: 1 Api itu sudah tegak dan tenang 2 untuk tidak mengatakan apa-apa lagi, dan sudah bergerak menjauh dari kami 3 dengan izin penyair yang lembut,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
4 quand’ un’altra, che dietro a lei venìa, 5 ne fece volger li occhi a la sua cima 6 per un confuso suon che fuor n’uscia.
query.error: **English:** 4 when another one, which was coming behind it, 5 made us turn our eyes to its top 6 because of a confused sound that was coming out of it.
query.result: 4 ketika yang lain, yang datang di belakangnya, 5 membuat kami mengalihkan pandangan ke puncaknya 6 karena suara bingung yang keluar darinya.

query.result: 7 Seperti lembu Sisilia yang mengaum lebih dulu 8 dengan tangisan orang yang membuatnya, dan itu benar, 9 yang telah membuatnya dengan kikirnya,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
10 mugghiava con la voce de l’afflitto, 11 sì che, con tutto che fosse di rame, 12 pur el pareva dal dolor trafitto;
query.error: **English:** 10 it bellowed with the voice of the afflicted, 11 so that, even though it was made of brass, 12 it still seemed pierced by pain;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
13 così, per non aver via né forame 14 dal principio nel foco, in suo linguaggio 15 si convertïan le parole grame.
query.error: **English:** 13 thus, for having no way or opening 14 from the beginning in the fire, in its own language 15 the woeful words were transformed.
query.result: 13 demikianlah, karena tidak ada jalan atau lubang 14 dari awal dalam api, dalam bahasanya sendiri 15 kata-kata menyedihkan itu berubah.

query.prompt:

query.result: 16 Tetapi setelah mereka telah mengambil perjalanan mereka 17 ke atas puncak, memberikannya sentakan 18 yang telah diberikan lidah dalam perjalanan mereka,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.result: 25 Jika Anda memang telah jatuh ke dunia buta ini 26 dari tanah Latin yang manis itu 27 dari mana saya mengumpulkan semua kesalahan saya,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
31 Io era in giuso ancora attento e chino, 32 quando il mio duca mi tentò di costa, 33 dicendo: «Parla tu; questi è latino».
query.error: **English:** 31 I was still attentive and bent down below, 32 when my guide touched my side, 33 saying: "Speak, you; this man is Latin."
query.result: 31 Aku masih penuh perhatian dan membungkuk di bawah, 32 ketika pemanduku menyentuh sisiku, 33 berkata: "Bicaralah, kamu; orang ini Latin."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
40 Ravenna sta come stata è molt’ anni: 41 l’aguglia da Polenta la si cova, 42 sì che Cervia ricuopre co’ suoi vanni.
query.error: **English:** 40 Ravenna remains as it has been for many years: 41 the eagle of Polenta broods over it, 42 so that Cervia is covered by its wings.
query.result: 40 Ravenna tetap seperti keadaannya selama bertahun-tahun: 41 elang Polenta mengeraminya, 42 sehingga Cervia tertutupi oleh sayap-sayapnya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.result: 43 Tanah yang pernah membuat ujian panjang 44 dan tumpukan orang Prancis yang berdarah, 45 ditemukan lagi di bawah cabang-cabang hijau.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.result: 49 Kota-kota Lamone dan Santerno 50 singa muda memimpin dari sarang putih, 51 yang berpindah sisi dari musim panas ke musim dingin.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
